Sacred Citadel *Proper Crack* (c) Deep Silver

04/2013: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Steam: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Action
Note: FLTs crack doesn't allow you to save the game

Sharpen your axe, string your bow, brew your potions! Ancaria needs heroes
like you. Grab your friends to join the resistance!The once peaceful land of
Ancaria is in grave danger. The evil Ashen empire has enslaved its population
and is using the orc-like Grimmoc to wipe out the Seraphim, who swore to
protect it. In order to defeat the empire you will have to prove yourself as
a warrior by riding terrifying mounts, acquiring earth shattering skills and
looting powerful weapons and valuable treasures. Grab your friends and join
the resistance!Key Features:Battle it out with up to 3 player co-opTake
charge of 1 of 4 unique playable character classes with their own set of
skillsExplore the vast world of AncariaRide thumping mounts and use
devastating war-machinesTons of loot!Define your own fighting style with
different weapon combinations

Features
* Battle it out with up to 3 player co-op
* Explore the vast world of Ancaria
* Tons of loot!

1. Unrar
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on to your game
install directory
4. Play the game
5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
